mapper.select: select p.id, p.title, p.user_id, p.region, p.start_date, p.end_date, pd.id as pd_id, pd.plan_id, pd.attraction_id, pd.day, pd.order from plan p left join plan_detail pd on p.id = pd.plan_id where p.user_id = #{userId} order by p.id, pd.day, pd.order limit #{size} offset #{offset}

select p.id, p.title, p.user_id, p.region, p.start_date, p.end_date, pd.id as pd_id, pd.plan_id, pd.attraction_id, pd.day, pd.order, att.id as att_id, att.title, att.content_type_id, att.addr, att.image, att.latitude, att.longitude, att.overview, att.popularity from plan p left join plan_detail pd on p.id = pd.plan_id join attraction att on pd.attraction_id = att.id where p.id = #{id} order by pd.day, pd.order
mapper.update: update (plan left join plan_detail pd on plan.id = pd.plan_id join attraction att on pd.attraction_id = att.id ) set att.popularity = att.popularity-1 where pd.plan_id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into plan (title, user_id, region, start_date, end_date) values (#{title}, #{userId}, #{region}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
insert into article (content, created_at, group_id, user_id) values (#{content}, now(), #{groupId}, #{userId})
